meanings.definition: The branch of philosophy dealing with the nature of beauty and taste.
meanings.sent1: Studying aesthetics helps us understand what is beautiful.
meanings.sent2: She appreciated the aesthetics of the painting.
meanings.sent3: The aesthetics of the garden made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her outfit was an aesthetic masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The aesthetics of the sunset took our breath away.

meanings.definition: The set of principles underlying the creation and appreciation of beauty.
meanings.sent1: Learning about aesthetics guides artists in creating beautiful works.
meanings.sent2: The architect considered the aesthetics of the building design.
meanings.sent3: The aesthetics of the cake made it too pretty to eat.
meanings.sent4: The aesthetics of the poem painted a vivid picture in our minds.
meanings.sent5: The aesthetics of the dance performance were mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: The pleasing appearance or effect of something.
meanings.sent1: The aesthetics of the room made it cozy and inviting.
meanings.sent2: She focused on the aesthetics of the website to attract more visitors.
meanings.sent3: The aesthetics of the puppy's antics brought laughter to the room.
meanings.sent4: The aesthetics of the music filled the hall with emotion.
meanings.sent5: The aesthetics of the garden transformed it into a peaceful retreat.
